com.flowpowered.nbt.stream

クラス NBTInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.nbt.stream.NBTInputStream
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class NBTInputStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    This class reads NBT, or Named Binary Tag streams, and produces an object graph of subclasses of the Tag object.

    The NBT format was created by Markus Persson, and the specification may be found at https://flowpowered.com/nbt/spec.txt.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      NBTInputStream(java.io.InputStream is)
      Creates a new NBTInputStream, which will source its data from the specified input stream.
      NBTInputStream(java.io.InputStream is, boolean compressed)
      Creates a new NBTInputStream, which sources its data from the specified input stream.
      NBTInputStream(java.io.InputStream is, boolean compressed, java.nio.ByteOrder endianness)
      Creates a new NBTInputStream, which sources its data from the specified input stream.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • NBTInputStream

        public NBTInputStream(java.io.InputStream is)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new NBTInputStream, which will source its data from the specified input stream. This assumes the stream is compressed.
        パラメータ:
        is - The input stream.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • NBTInputStream

        public NBTInputStream(java.io.InputStream is,
                      boolean compressed)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new NBTInputStream, which sources its data from the specified input stream. A flag must be passed which indicates if the stream is compressed with GZIP or not. This assumes the stream uses big endian encoding.
        パラメータ:
        is - The input stream.
        compressed - A flag indicating if the stream is compressed.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • NBTInputStream

        public NBTInputStream(java.io.InputStream is,
                      boolean compressed,
                      java.nio.ByteOrder endianness)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new NBTInputStream, which sources its data from the specified input stream. A flag must be passed which indicates if the stream is compressed with GZIP or not.
        パラメータ:
        is - The input stream.
        compressed - A flag indicating if the stream is compressed.
        endianness - Whether to read numbers from the InputStream with little endian encoding.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • readTag

        public Tag readTag()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an NBT Tag from the stream.
        戻り値:
        The tag that was read.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        定義:
        close インタフェース内 java.io.Closeable
        定義:
        close インタフェース内 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        例外:
        java.io.IOException

      • getByteOrder

        public java.nio.ByteOrder getByteOrder()
        戻り値:
        whether this NBTInputStream reads numbers in little-endian format.
